scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run build:jsx-runtime && bun run build:jsx-dev-runtime && bun run build:core && bun run build:core-client && bun run build:core-server
scripts.build:core: bun build --minify --target=bun --outdir=out/core src/core/index.ts && bun run build:cli && cp src/types/index.d.ts out/core/index.d.ts
scripts.build:core-server: bun build --minify --target=bun --outdir=server src/core/server/index.ts && bun run build:cli && cp src/types/index.d.ts server/index.d.ts
scripts.build:core-client: bun build --minify --outdir=client src/core/client/index.ts && bun run build:cli && cp src/types/index.d.ts client/index.d.ts
scripts.build:jsx-runtime: bun build --minify --target=bun --outdir=jsx-runtime src/jsx-runtime/index.ts && cp src/types/index.d.ts jsx-runtime/index.d.ts
scripts.build:jsx-dev-runtime: bun build --minify --target=bun --outdir=jsx-dev-runtime src/jsx-runtime/index.ts && cp src/types/index.d.ts jsx-dev-runtime/index.d.ts
scripts.release-create-brisa:alpha: cd src/create-brisa && npm publish --tag next  && cd ../..
scripts.release-all: bun run build && npm publish && bun run clean && bun run release-create-brisa
scripts.release:alpha: bun run build && npm publish --tag next && bun run clean
scripts.clean: rm -rf out jsx-runtime jsx-dev-runtime cli client
